ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Embrasures
ModMetaData.author: Anon
ModMetaData.description:
Embrasures (aka Murder Holes) balanced for vanilla Rimworld.
- Compatible with Breachable Embrasures. - If Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module is present then it also adds a Reinforced Embrasure based on the Reinforced Wall. - Compatible with Combat Extended based on choice: If loaded after CE, then it will replace the CE Embrasure. If loaded before CE, then it will not. The Reinforced Embrasure is added independent of this, as long as VFE - Spacer is present.
